Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FlowType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.TokenRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.TokenBucketSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.PeakBandwidth" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.Latency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.DelayVariation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.ServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="SendSpec.MaxSduSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SendSpec.MinimumPolicedSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="QoSObjectBufferLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="QoSObjectBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="QoSObjectBufferLen"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FlowType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.TokenRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.TokenBucketSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.PeakBandwidth" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.Latency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.DelayVariation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.ServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.MaxSduSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.MinimumPolicedSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.TokenRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.TokenBucketSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.PeakBandwidth" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.Latency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.DelayVariation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.ServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.MaxSduSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.MinimumPolicedSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewQoSObjectBufferLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewQoSObjectBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="NewQoSObjectBufferLen"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetLuid" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="8"/> <data name="NdisMediumType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetLuid" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="8"/> <data name="NdisMediumType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FlowType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.TokenRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.TokenBucketSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.PeakBandwidth" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.Latency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.DelayVariation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.ServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.MaxSduSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldSendSpec.MinimumPolicedSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.TokenRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.TokenBucketSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.PeakBandwidth" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.Latency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.DelayVariation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.ServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.MaxSduSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSendSpec.MinimumPolicedSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewQoSObjectBufferLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewQoSObjectBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="NewQoSObjectBufferLen"/> <data name="AffectedPackets" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
